name: PUZZLETIME: Castle Party
description:
Castle Party is the new game in the PUZZLETIME series. Visit a private party in the old castle with beautiful girls and discover what secrets the corridors of the estate keep. Find out what trouble 3 beautiful girls will get in 9 different scenes.

Features:


3 beautiful girls
9 puzzles
Adult content
Openable Image Gallery
Achievements
Steam Cloud
Free 18+ DLC
